issue.title: [CF 266] Timer for Condition icon
issue.body:
At first, thank you for you hard work. :)
Sometimes we can use ICD or Unit CD to track something with a timer, but this is not a good idea, it's not 100% perfect to countdown beacuse it will delay, and it won't work for (the spell is usable start countdown X seconds).


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #266 | Raw
